events.name: Volunteer's meeting
events.short: Whether you’re a Fresher or a Charity Week Veteran, Volunteer’s Meeting is your first stop to find out everything about the campaign and how you can get involved!

events.name: Annual Dinner and Auction
events.short: Imperial College Charity Week invites you to our renowned flagship event - the Annual Charity Week Dinner! This is a must attend event for everyone!

events.name: Food Festival
events.short: Food Festival is where you can find a range of mouth-watering cuisines, fun activities and buzzing vibes, all located in the heart of London!

events.name: Collects
events.short: Collects is the heart of Charity Week! Put on your CW t-shirt, grab a bucket and raise as much money as possible at street collects, tube collects and brand new this year: mosque collects!

events.name: Challenges
events.short: Challenges is about pushing yourself out of your comfort zone, to not only raise money but develop yourself as an individual and unite as a community.

events.name: Stalls
events.short: From chicken wings to cakes to smoothies - all available in one place, CW Stalls! Come along, experience this wonderful mix of food and have a chat and learn what CW is all about!

events.name: Big Brunch
events.short: An afternoon of food and fun as we aim to spread the message of Charity Week through mouth-watering cuisine whilst we delve into the meaning of charity with our guest performances.

events.name: Speaker Event
events.short: An evening full of eye-opening talks detailing some of the many disasters scattered across our world and what we can do to help. You do not want to miss this!
